content:
DataGridLineStyle Enum

Definition

Specifies the style of gridlines in a DataGrid.

In this Article

public enum DataGridLineStyle
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
DataGridLineStyle

Examples

The following example sets the GridLineStyle property to DataGridLineStyle.None. 

private:
   void SetGridLineAttributes()
   {
      dataGrid1->GridLineStyle = DataGridLineStyle::None;
   }

private void SetGridLineAttributes()
{
   dataGrid1.GridLineStyle = DataGridLineStyle.None;
}

Private Sub SetGridLineAttributes()
    dataGrid1.GridLineStyle = DataGridLineStyle.None
End Sub 'SetGridLineAttributes

Remarks

Use the members of this enumeration to set the value of the GridLineStyle property of the System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid class. The default is Solid.

Fields

None

No gridlines between cells.
Solid

Solid gridlines between cells.
